1{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
2
3-- | Content operators on clocks and times.
4
5module Koshucode.Baala.Cop.Time
6  ( copsTime
7    -- $Operators
8  ) where
9
10import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Overture    as O
11import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Data        as D
12import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Cop.Message as Msg
13
14
15
16-- ----------------------
17-- $Operators
18--
19--  [@add-day@]    Add days to time.
20--
21--  [@add-week@]   Add weeks to time.
22--
23--  [@add-month@]  Add months to time.
24--
25--  [@add-year@]   Add years to time.
26--
27--  [@mjd@]        Modified Jurian Day of time.
28--
29
30-- | Content operators on clocks and times.
31copsTime :: (D.CTime c, D.CDec c) => [D.Cop c]
32copsTime =
33    [ D.CopCalc  (D.copNormal "add-day")    $ copTimeAdd D.timeAddDay
34    , D.CopCalc  (D.copNormal "add-week")   $ copTimeAdd D.timeAddWeek
35    , D.CopCalc  (D.copNormal "add-month")  $ copTimeAdd D.timeAddMonth
36    , D.CopCalc  (D.copNormal "add-year")   $ copTimeAdd D.timeAddYear
37    , D.CopCalc  (D.copNormal "mjd")        copMjd
38    , D.CopCalc  (D.copNormal "weekly")     $ copDateForm D.weekly
39    , D.CopCalc  (D.copNormal "monthly")    $ copDateForm D.monthly
40    , D.CopCalc  (D.copNormal "yearly")     $ copDateForm D.yearly
41    ]
42
43copTimeAdd :: (D.CTime c, D.CDec c) => (Integer -> O.Map D.Time) -> D.CopCalc c
44copTimeAdd add [Right c1, Right c2]
45    | D.isDec c1 && D.isTime c2 = addc c1 c2
46    | D.isDec c2 && D.isTime c1 = addc c2 c1
47    where addc nc tc = let n = toInteger $ D.decimalNum $ D.gDec nc
48                           t = D.gTime tc
49                       in Right $ D.pTime $ add n t
50copTimeAdd _ _ = Msg.unexpAttr "add-time"
51
52copMjd :: (D.CTime c, D.CDec c) => D.CopCalc c
53copMjd [Right c] | D.isTime c = Right $ D.pInteger $ D.timeMjd $ D.gTime c
54copMjd _ = Msg.unexpAttr "mjd"
55
56copDateForm :: (D.CTime c) => O.Map D.Date -> D.CopCalc c
57copDateForm f [Right c] | D.isTime c = D.putTime $ D.timeAltDate f $ D.gTime c
58copDateForm _ _ = Msg.unexpAttr "date"
59
